articles.author: Aaron Bearden
articles.title: The winners and losers from a wet and wild 2025 Indianapolis 500 - Motorsport.com
articles.description: With fires, crashes, and impressive moves for track position up and down the field, here’s who made headlines at this year’s Indy 500
articles.content:
Theres nothing like the Month of May at Indianapolis Motor Speedway and rarely has the Indianapolis 500 been more eventful than the iconic events 2025 edition.
